text.tspan: Original team of the project in 2001
I really don't remember name of the great guy :(
The original game was developed by RuSoft Ltd in 2001 in C++ for E3 2001
to demonstrate the GFX-server technology developed by Gamefederation AS.
(The PC game version has been rewritten in Java by Igor Maznitsa in 2021)
Original team of the project in 2001
I really don't remember name of the great guy :(
The original game was developed by RuSoft Ltd in 2001 in C++ for E3 2001
to demonstrate the GFX-server technology developed by Gamefederation AS.
(The PC game version has been rewritten in Java by Igor Maznitsa in 2021)
